text: @realDonaldTrump You don't care about George Floyd, you psychotic pathological narcissist. This is just a diversion to take attention away from your reckless handling of COVID-19 pandemic and your over 103,000 counts of Involuntary Manslaughter. @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @WhiteHouse https://t.co/qhjcRzl8nX
